languages.text: "Мы зовем себя {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детьми Азуриана{/g}. Иное наше имя — {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдары{/g}. Мы — эхо великой империи, некогда правившей галактикой и сотворявшей миры. Планета, которую вы зовете Янусом — один из таких первозданных миров, Лилэтан. Пристанище, которое наши предки создали для своих собратьев. На протяжении многих тысячелетий лишь тени наших предшественников жили среди руин... пока сюда не пришли вы, люди".

"We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."
languages.original_text: "Мы зовем себя {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детьми Азуриана{/g}. Иное наше имя — {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдары{/g}. Мы — эхо великой империи, некогда правившей галактикой и сотворявшей миры. Планета, которую вы зовете Янусом — один из таких первозданных миров, Лилэтан. Пристанище, которое наши предки создали для своих собратьев. На протяжении многих тысячелетий лишь тени наших предшественников жили среди руин... пока сюда не пришли вы, люди".

traits.locale_text: "We call ourselves the Children of Asuryan. Aeldari is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."

"We call ourselves the Children of Asuryan. Aeldari is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."

"We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."

languages.text: 「我々は自らを{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子{/g}と呼ぶ。{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}は別名だ。かつて銀河を支配して新世界を創造した、古王国の残響。あなたたちがヤヌスと呼んでいる星はそうしたメイデンワールドのひとつで、リラエタンという。我々の祖先が同胞のために作った安息の地。何百年もの間、この廃墟にあったのは先人達の影だけ…あなたたち人類が来るまでは」
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は自らを{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子{/g}と呼ぶ。{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}は別名だ。かつて銀河を支配して新世界を創造した、古王国の残響。あなたたちがヤヌスと呼んでいる星はそうしたメイデンワールドのひとつで、リラエタンという。我々の祖先が同胞のために作った安息の地。何百年もの間、この廃墟にあったのは先人達の影だけ…あなたたち人類が来るまでは」

languages.text: “我们自称{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}，而{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}是我们另一个名字。我们的祖先的伟大帝国曾经统治了整个银河系，创造了无数新的世界，而你们称之为‘加努斯’的行星就是其中之一。莉莱赞，是我们的祖先为族人建造的天堂。千百年来，只有我们祖先的影子在废墟中回荡……直到你们人类来到这里。”
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."

traits.locale_text: “我们自称{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}，而{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}是我们另一个名字。我们的祖先的伟大帝国曾经统治了整个银河系，创造了无数新的世界，而你们称之为‘加努斯’的行星就是其中之一。莉莱赞，是我们的祖先为族人建造的天堂。千百年来，只有我们祖先的影子在废墟中回荡……直到你们人类来到这里。”

languages.text: «Nos hacemos llamar {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} es otro nombre para nuestra especie. Somos los ecos del gran imperio que una vez dominó la galaxia y creó nuevos mundos. El planeta que tú llamas Janus es uno de tales mundos vírgenes, el Lilaethan. Un refugio que nuestros antepasados construyeron para los suyos. Durante muchos milenios, únicamente las sombras de nuestros predecesores habitaron sus ruinas... hasta que llegasteis los humanos».
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."

traits.locale_text: «Nos hacemos llamar {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} es otro nombre para nuestra especie. Somos los ecos del gran imperio que una vez dominó la galaxia y creó nuevos mundos. El planeta que tú llamas Janus es uno de tales mundos vírgenes, el Lilaethan. Un refugio que nuestros antepasados construyeron para los suyos. Durante muchos milenios, únicamente las sombras de nuestros predecesores habitaron sus ruinas... hasta que llegasteis los humanos».

languages.text: "Wir selbst nennen uns die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g}. Ein weiterer Name für uns ist {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}. Wir sind Echos des großen Reichs, das einst die Galaxie beherrschte und neue Welten schuf. Der Planet, den Ihr Janus nennt, ist eine derartige Jungfernwelt, Lileath. Ein Zuflucht, die unsere Ahnen für ihre Nachkommen geschaffen haben. Viele Jahrtausende lang lebten in den Ruinen nur die Schatten unserer Vorgänger ... bis Ihr Menschen herkamt."
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."

traits.locale_text: "Wir selbst nennen uns die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g}. Ein weiterer Name für uns ist {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}. Wir sind Echos des großen Reichs, das einst die Galaxie beherrschte und neue Welten schuf. Der Planet, den Ihr Janus nennt, ist eine derartige Jungfernwelt, Lileath. Ein Zuflucht, die unsere Ahnen für ihre Nachkommen geschaffen haben. Viele Jahrtausende lang lebten in den Ruinen nur die Schatten unserer Vorgänger ... bis Ihr Menschen herkamt."

languages.text: « Nous nous appelons les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g}, mais nous répondons également au nom d'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g}. Nous sommes les échos du grand empire qui régnait autrefois sur la galaxie et créait de nouveaux mondes. La planète que vous nommez "Janus" est justement l'un de ces mondes vierges, la lilaethan, un havre de paix conçu par nos ancêtres pour leurs semblables. Pendant de nombreux millénaires, seules les ombres de nos prédécesseurs hantaient ses ruines... jusqu'à l'arrivée des humains. »
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous appelons les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g}, mais nous répondons également au nom d'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g}. Nous sommes les échos du grand empire qui régnait autrefois sur la galaxie et créait de nouveaux mondes. La planète que vous nommez "Janus" est justement l'un de ces mondes vierges, la lilaethan, un havre de paix conçu par nos ancêtres pour leurs semblables. Pendant de nombreux millénaires, seules les ombres de nos prédécesseurs hantaient ses ruines... jusqu'à l'arrivée des humains. »

languages.text: "Bize {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g} derler. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} olarak da biliniriz. Bir zamanlar galakside hüküm süren ve yeni dünyalar yaratan yüce imparatorluğun kalıntılarıyız. Janus dediğiniz gezegen de bir Bakir Dünya; atalarımızın, hısımları için yaptığı güvenli bir limandır. Adı Lilaethan. Binlerce yıl bu harabelerde yalnızca seleflerimizin gölgeleri yaşadı. Ta ki siz insanlar gelene dek..."
languages.original_text: "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} is another name of ours. We are the echoes of the great empire that once ruled the galaxy and created new worlds. The planet that you call Janus is one such Maiden World, the Lilaethan. A haven that our ancestors made for their kin. For many millennia, only the shadows of our predecessors lived among the ruins... until you humans came here."

traits.locale_text: "Bize {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g} derler. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} olarak da biliniriz. Bir zamanlar galakside hüküm süren ve yeni dünyalar yaratan yüce imparatorluğun kalıntılarıyız. Janus dediğiniz gezegen de bir Bakir Dünya; atalarımızın, hısımları için yaptığı güvenli bir limandır. Adı Lilaethan. Binlerce yıl bu harabelerde yalnızca seleflerimizin gölgeleri yaşadı. Ta ki siz insanlar gelene dek..."
